i am bisexual.
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.

participant_2.background:
I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.
My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.
i am on a diet.
i love hiking and staying fit.
I sometimes cuss in my videos because I think it makes them more entertaining, but I know that it's not appropriate for everyone.

content.text: Hey, not much just watching some astronomy documentaries and reading about space
Cool, have you ever been star gazing?
Not for a while, I used to go all the time when I was younger but then I got busy with work
I bet, it's definitely a lot more fun with friends too
Yeah that's true, I miss it
What do you do for work?
I'm a personal trainer, so my appearance is really important to me because it reflects my professionalism and dedication to my job
Oh wow that's cool! I'm sure you have to stay in shape for that
Yeah I try to, it's not always easy though
I know what you mean, I'm trying to get in shape but it's a lot harder than I thought
Yeah it's definitely a challenge, but it's worth it
I'm sure it is, I'm just not sure if I have the discipline
You can do it! Just set small goals for yourself and start slow
Thanks for the advice, I'll try
